page.title: 15Poringland's Local Events
page.content: There are many local event that go on in Poringland and Upper Stoke all of which get published in the local parish magazine 'Contact' - There is the Mother's Union which takes place every Tuesday evening.There is also the Young Wives Club.For the children there is the Windmill Playshceme for children aged between 5-11.Also in Poringland there is a Youth Club for the teenagers.The men of Poringland also have a club called the Wednesday Group.Poringland also has a local Womans Institute which meets regularly.Every year towards the summer the local schools have a sports afternoon where family and friends can go and see the races their children have taken part in.Every Sunday there is a Sunday school at the local Parish.Poringland also runs lots of charities ie Big C Appeal & St.Andrews
